description:
China HATES foreigners. They've been segregated, slurred, and now stabbings are on the rise. What's driving it? And why does the CCP approve of it?

I’m trying to get around YouTube censorship by hiding controversial topics in gaming content. Check out the latest episode of my new show Deep Thoughts While Gaming, “If A Robot Identifies As a Woman…” https://youtu.be/Bb_6htsA0qU

YouTube demonetizes our channels, we need your support!
https://www.patreon.com/ChinaUncensored
https://chinauncensored.locals.com

We also accept bitcoin!

title: Xenophobia Has Run WILD in China
